title: 自己设置的菜单为什么用不了
author: 孤仙肆
txt_content:
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # REQUIRED
  # Appears as the title of the menu.
  name: '&6云刃菜单'

  # REQUIRED
  # The number of rows in the menu.
  rows: 3

  # OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  # Bind multiple commands using ; (command: 'menu; m; me')
  command: 'menu'

  # OPTIONAL
  # How frequently the menu will be refreshed, in seconds.
  # Useful if you have variables in items' descriptions.
  auto-refresh: 5

  # OPTIONAL
  # This command command will be executed when the menu is opened.
  # Supports all the icon command types.
  open-action: ''

  # OPTIONAL
  # The menu will open only when right-clicking with a compass.
  open-with-item:
    id: compass
    left-click: false
    right-click: true


######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


tsetitem:
  COMMAND: 'spawn'
  NAME: '&e回到主城'
  LORE:
    - '&5点击我回到主城'
    - '&5或者输入命令/spawn'
  ID: beacon
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1


tsetitem:
  NAME: '&a我的财产'
  LORE:
    - '&4金币:{money}'
    - '&4&n点卷:{points}'
  ID: skull
  DATA-VALUE: 3
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 1


tsetitem:
  NAME: '&a可&b爱&c的&d小&e玻&f璃'
  LORE:
    - '&a单&b纯&c的&d隔&e离'
  ID: stained glass pane
  DATA-VALUE: 2
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 1


tsetitem:
  COMMAND: 'warp dp'
  NAME: '&a前往地皮世界'
  LORE:
    - '&5点击我前往地皮世界'
  ID: grass
  POSITION-X: 4
  POSITION-Y: 1


tsetitem:
  COMMAND: 'warp md'
  NAME: '&c前往末地'
  LORE:
    - '&f点击我前往末地'
  ID: end stone
  POSITION-X: 5
  POSITION-Y: 1


tsetitem:
  COMMAND: 'warp sd'
  NAME: '&c前往商店'
  LORE:
    - '&e点击我前往商店'
    - '&6各种好物千万不能错过'
  ID: item frame
  POSITION-X: 6
  POSITION-Y: 1


tsetitem:
  COMMAND: 'warp dy'
  NAME: '&4前往地狱世界'
  LORE:
    - '&4点击我前往地狱世界'
    - '&4烈焰人掉神残魂'
  ID: netherrack
  POSITION-X: 7
  POSITION-Y: 1


tsetitem:
  COMMAND: 'warp hd'
  NAME: '&e活动举办区'
  LORE:
    - '&a点击我前往活动举办区'
    - '&b有各种各样的好玩活动'
    - '&c千万不要错过'
  ID: golwstone
  POSITION-X: 8
  POSITION-Y: 1


tsetitem:
  NAME: '&a可&b爱&c的&d小&e玻&f璃'
  LORE:
    - '&a单&b纯&c的&d隔&e离'
  ID: stained glass pane
  DATA-VALUE: 2
  POSITION-X: 9
  POSITION-Y: 1


tsetitem:
  COMMAND: 'warp sc'
  NAME: '&d前往生存世界'
  LORE:
    - '&5你可以在这里圈地'
    - '&c注意：这个世界没有死亡不掉落'
    - '&f东西丢失不赔'
    - '&f圈地需要金币'
    - '&f圈地指令/res'
    - '&f/res help指令帮助'
    - '&f金币不足无法圈地'
  ID: grass
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 2
这个是我自己设置的菜单请大佬看看哪里错了？
